attributes.action: Students to have access to toilets in and during classes
attributes.additional_details: Students are being left to the point of releving themselves in classrooms due to not being allowed to access a toilet
attributes.background: I want the goverment to put into place that all pupils should be able to access a toilet when needed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
